Sets special2 (raise speed) to 5, initializes floor clipping to actor's height, and sets the first arg..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_ThrustInitDn'''
(''no parameter'')
Sets special2 (raise speed) to 5, initializes floor clipping to actor's height, and sets the first argument to 0 (lowered). The flags {{Flag|NOTELEPORT}} and {{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} are set and many other flags will be cleared. The actor is set to be invisible and a {{Class|DirtClump}} is spawned in its place. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrustFloor}} and derived classes.
